definition:
منصرف munṣarif fully inflected, i.e., triptotical (gram.); المنصرف the money spent, expenditures


منصرف munṣarif departure, leave, going away │ لا منصرف عنه (munṣarafa) 513 indispensable, inevitable; منصرفهم munṣarafahum at their departure, when they left; في صرف النهار (m. in-nahār) at the parting of day, at day’s end
